Summary: Slowly rotated from sphere to football shape with a knob on top.
divs: Sighting DetailsArrived home the bus was on schedule.Landlords brother-inlaw asked what is that up in the sky? Looked North-West at 11:00am..Thought object was first a bird then a balloon. It was very slow moving.Then noticed it was rotating. Changing from small sphere to football shape. Noticed Dome or knob on top and something like a rod sticking out of the dome.Ran into the house to get my binoculars and lost sight of it. Neighbur said it went in the clouds. This was at 8:41pm. This really caught my interest. Blimps hover but I dont think they rotate,Hot air balloons might but there was no basket.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around June 28th 2006
